item.title: Does CEO Pay Matter?
item.description: Abstract The government of United States of American now request all public companies to disclose their data about salary of CEOs and median employees. The information is valuable because U.S. citizens and job seekers may know which companies devote themselves to creating more job opportunities. In this report, we analyzed the dataset that was scraped from AFL-CIO, wikipedia, and Yahoo Finance, which contained salaries for CEOs and median employees, revenue in 2017, number of employees, education of CEOs, and so on.
